LanguageData.Leg.label: leg
LanguageData.Leg.description: A biological human leg. Basically long meaty sticks that let you move around.
LanguageData.Foot.label: foot
LanguageData.Foot.description: A biological human foot. The thing you can put shoes on.
LanguageData.Arm.label: arm
LanguageData.Arm.description: A biological human arm. Arms are like legs, except you can carry stuff with them.
LanguageData.Hand.label: hand
LanguageData.Stomach.label: stomach
LanguageData.Stomach.description: A biological human stomach. Digests food and turns it into energy and nutrients.
LanguageData.Brain.label: brain
LanguageData.Brain.description: A biological human brain. The center of all Consciousness.
LanguageData.Eye.label: eyeball
LanguageData.Eye.description: A biological human eyeball. Absorbs light, which lets a person know what's around them.
LanguageData.Nose.label: nose
LanguageData.Nose.description: A biological human nose. A pretty useful organ to distinguish odors, applies the finishing touch to a face.
LanguageData.Ear.label: ear
LanguageData.Ear.description: A biological human ear. Picks up vibrations in the air, allowing people to hear sound.
LanguageData.Jaw.label: jaw
LanguageData.Jaw.description: A biological human jaw. A nice set of teeth for chewing food and talking.
